items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater dress or tunic.
items.body: Well made and soft. Perfect dress length. came to the top of my knees. Will always wear with leggings. Perfect amount of stretch. a bit shear but dark or matching tights or leggings will solve that issue. Can be dressed up or down with some chunky jewelry to make it pop. I'm 5.3 149 36DD Small fit perfect. Read more
items.author: Celeste R.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable sweater dress
items.body: Nice sweater dress. I love the color, its a deep burgundy. The fit is fine as its a sweater dress, but it is not form fitting like the image might have you believe. Its warm and long enough that I wore it to work with a pair if legging under. Its like a chunky knit, typical sweater material. Stretchy but not form fitting. I would usually wear a medium and the medium fit great. Read more
items.author: LeighAnn Morris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice form-fitted knit dress, that feels amazing, plus giving casual
items.body: This dress was it! I wore it for Thanksgiving 2025, and it was a great fit! It does run bigger, in my opinion, because I would have ordered an XL, but I gave the large a try, and it fit, as pictured. It states that it is wool, but it didn't give you that itchy wool feel. It was slightly see-through, so you might want to wear a slip under it, but that decision is up to you, because I forgot my slip. I still threw this on with some knee-high boots and a makeshift belt (actually tied a scarf because Iforgot my belt as well), and I actually didn't even pay attention to the fact you can see through the eyelets of the dress. It has that standard woven design, and is actually fairly warm. I hate a turtleneck, but this was loose and fit well. It would probably be paired well with a belt too, even though it does go on form fitted. Also, I have a larger chest, my butt is smaller, but if I had an hourglass shape, my butt cheeks probably would have hung out, taking this dress from a more casual classy, to inappropriate. So, for those that are more shapely, I would say this dress would look nice with a pair of tights as well. Beautifully designed. Read more
items.author: KEI

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute looks great with leggings
items.body: The overall fit of this sweater dress is accurate to the size chart, providing a comfortable yet structured drape without feeling overly bulky. The length is definitely a mini style, so layering with tights or leggings is necessary for coverage during deep winter. The cable knit pattern is tight and consistent throughout the garment, giving the dress a quality texture appropriate for a holiday or cold-weather event. While the synthetic material is quite warm and soft, users should expect to use a lint roller as there is some minor natural shedding typical of this type of chunky knit. This piece transitions easily from a casual weekend look with boots to a slightly dressier ensemble when paired with heels and appropriate accessories. Overall, it serves as a reliable and warm option for colder months, performing exactly as a classic mini sweater dress should. Read more
items.author: PM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, sexy, warm, & comfortable!
items.body: This dress fits me so perfectly!! Follow the size guide provided. I ordered a medium. I'm 5' 3.5" tall and weigh 139lbs. Length fell about 2" above my knee. Material is soft and warm. Normally I'm not a huge fan of turtle necks but this was not restrictive and didn't make me feel like I was choking or needed to be pulled away from my neck all day long. Very comfortable! So classy. I got so many compliments at the party I wore it to. The style is so cute with the right amount of sexy. I love the knit pattern. Can't say enough good things about this dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering; thin
items.body: This SunnyMelody cable knit turtleneck sweater dress is stylish and flattering. It’s an affordable fall/winter wardrobe piece that can be styled in so many ways. It’s somewhat thin with the cable knit leaving open holes when it stretches, so you may consider wearing a slip or nude undergarments. I also find that it runs a bit small. I’m 5’7, size 4 and always wear a small. I ordered a small in this dress and find it to be tighter than I’d prefer (and I do like a form fitting dress!) and the sleeves are short. I would recommend sizing up one size. The material is as you would expect- slightly itchy, a little stiff, but lays well. Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for that family and friends party
items.body: Beautiful dress, not a see through dress, beautiful color perfect for any occasion, is made of soft fabric. Not too short not too large. For reference my wife is 5’2 and she is using size S Read more
items.author: Carlos Fuentes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and super comfy
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised by how well this fits! It hugs my body just right — not too tight, not too loose. The knit feels substantial, and the turtleneck keeps me warm even without a scarf. I wore it to a holiday gathering, and everyone commented on how classy it looked. You can dress it up with heels or keep it casual with boots. Read more
items.author: Leticia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burnt Coral Red, Mocha Brown, White, Cream Almond, Burgundy, Army Green, Black, Caramel Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
